item.description:
Do you yearn for some mental stimulation...do you love to read? Have you ever read a really good book and wanted to be able to discuss it with someone? Have you ever read a book and had some unanswered questions? Do you enjoy hanging out with fun people and having intelligent conversation? This is why we decided to form this book club.

We are avid readers, love to talk about books and would love to meet and socialize with some new people in the area. We will meet monthly to select a book, read it and discuss it at the next meetup.

Our book club is being led by a lifelong and very dear friend of mine, who happens to be an educator. She has taught in the Connecticut school system for 36 years. Rose possesses a keen mind, a warm personality and a humorous side, which is refreshing. We are so lucky to have her!

We plan to meet and greet at our first meeting. Let's get to know each other...perhaps share a little of what we foresee for the group and select a book which we can read and discuss at our February meetup...all while having fun and a few laughs.

Come out and join us...meet some great folks...and socialize with friends that share the "bookworm" side of life. Happy Reading!!!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Reading With Rose...Our First Meetup...
